availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary O'Donnell. Father of Johanna O'Donnell, John O'Donnell, Ellen O'Donnell, Edward O'Donnell, and Bridget O'Donnell. Merchant in Covington in 1850. Merchant in Covington in 1860. Employed Catherine Casehamer as a servant in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 269A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, pp. 671-72.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 238A.
